exercises.raw: Planks : 3 sets x 50 (60) sec x Bodyweight
exercises.name: Planks

exercises.raw: #26: Chest Press: adj# 1 : 1 set x 15 reps x 80 lbs 1 set x  (15) reps x 90 lbs, 1 sets x 15 reps x 100 lbs,  1 set x 15 reps x 110  lbs ( use top handle, breathe out when you push out, keep abs tight and you push…Bellybutton to the Spine)…1 min rest
exercises.name: Chest Press
Flat Bench Press / Jackknife abs
exercises.raw: Flat Bench Press: 1 set x 10 reps x 95 lbs , 1 set x 8 reps x 95 lbs, 1 set x 6 reps x 105 , 1 set x 4 (6) x 115 lbs …70 sec rest + Jackknife abs: 3 sets x 15 (30) reps x Bodyweight

#24: Wide Lat Pull: adj #2: 1 set x 15 reps x 80 lbs, 1 set  x 12 reps x 90 lbs, 1 set x  12 x 100 lbs, 1 set x 8-12 reps x 110 lbs.. (thumbs in the corner and over the top, lean back 20 degrees and pull down to your collarbone, squeeze between your shoulder blades) 45 sec rest
exercises.name: Wide Lat Pull

exercises.raw: Bicycle abs: 3 sets x 35 (60) sec x Bodyweight ( tuck hands underneath chin, raise shoulder blades, keep abs tight and pedal legs)
exercises.name: Bicycle abs
exercises.notes: tuck hands underneath chin, raise shoulder blades, keep abs tight and pedal legs

exercises.raw: #28: Leg Press: adj#4 : 1 set x (15) reps x 90 lbs, 1 set x 15 x 120lbs,  1 set x 10-15 reps x 130 lbs…. 1 min rest ( bring legs down to 90 degrees , when you push up come close but DON’T lock out knees… push through your heels)
exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.notes: bring legs down to 90 degrees , when you push up come close but DON’T lock out knees… push through your heels

exercises.raw: #9: Incline Chest Press: adj# 2/7:  1 set x (15) reps x 50 lbs, 1 set x 12 (15) reps x 60 lbs, 1 set x 10-12 (15) x 70 lbs 1 min rest
exercises.name: Incline Chest Press

exercises.raw: Dumbbell Incline Chest Press: adj#7/3: 1 set x 15 reps x 20 lbs, 1 set set x 15 reps x 25 lbs , 1 set  x 12 (15) reps x 30 lbs, 1 set x 10-12 x 35 lbs 1 min rest
exercises.name: Dumbbell Incline Chest Press
Seated Bicep Hammer Curls / decline Ab twist
exercises.raw: Seated Bicep Hammer Curls: 1 set x 15 reps x 20 lbs, 2 sets x 10-12 (15) reps x 25 lbs …..30 sec rest + #34: decline Ab twist: adj#4: 3 sets x  27 (60) reps x 8 lb med ball ( lean back with chest out, keep eye contact in the mirror and twist torso, keep abs tight when you breathe out)
exercises.notes: lean back with chest out, keep eye contact in the mirror and twist torso, keep abs tight when you breathe out

exercises.raw: #20: Pec-Fly: adj #8: 1 set x 15 reps x 60 lbs , 1 set  x  15 reps x 70 lbs , 1 set x 15 x 80 lbs … 1 min rest ( think outside chest to inside of chest )
exercises.name: Pec-Fly
exercises.notes: think outside chest to inside of chest

exercises.raw: Straight bar rotation: 3 sets x 5-8 (12) reps x bodyweight … 45 sec rest
exercises.name: Straight bar rotation

exercises.raw: #13: Triceps Variation Pushdowns/Pulldowns: Pushdown 3 sets x 15 Reps x 60 lbs Pulldown, 3 sets x 15 Reps x 50 lbs…1 min rest  ( palms down, thumbs on top, feet shoulder width apart, knees slightly bent, pushdown and roll knuckles to your  thighs)
exercises.name: Triceps Variation Pushdowns/Pulldowns
exercises.notes: palms down, thumbs on top, feet shoulder width apart, knees slightly bent, pushdown and roll knuckles to your  thighs
